allow: Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "cd ''F:\MYproject\Zhang_Note\zhang_reader''; if (Test-Path release) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force release }; npx electron-builder --win --dir 2>&1")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process powershell.exe -Verb RunAs -Wait -ArgumentList ''-NoProfile -Command ""Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath \""F:\MYproject\Zhang_Note\zhang_reader\""; Add-MpPreference -ExclusionProcess \""electron.exe\""; Add-MpPreference -ExclusionExtension \"".exe\""; Write-Host Done""''")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "cd ''F:\MYproject\Zhang_Note\zhang_reader''; if (Test-Path release) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force release }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; npx electron-builder --win --dir 2>&1")
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Get-CimInstance -Namespace root/SecurityCenter2 -ClassName AntiVirusProduct | Select-Object displayName, pathToSignedProductExe")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem ''F:\MYproject\Zhang_Note\zhang_reader\release'' -Recurse | Where-Object { -not $_PSIsContainer } | Select-Object Name, Length, @{N=''SizeMB'';E={[math]::Round($_Length/1MB, 2)}} | Format-Table -AutoSize")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem ''F:\MYproject\Zhang_Note\zhang_reader\release'' -Recurse | Where-Object { $_Name -like ''*.exe'' } | Select-Object Name, Length, @{N=''SizeMB'';E={[math]::Round($_Length/1MB, 2)}} | Format-Table -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "cd ''F:\MYproject\Zhang_Note\zhang_reader''; if (Test-Path release) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force release }; echo ''Release folder cleaned''")
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Stop-Process -Name node -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Write-Host ''Node processes killed''")
